src:
Stororder för Volvo Bussar - ”Den största i Europa”
Volvo Bussar och transportföretaget Transdev har tecknat ett avtal om närmare 160 elbussar. Affären presenterades på en pressträff på tisdagen, rapporterar  Göteborgs-Posten.
05 Nov 2019, 11:06 by TT, Di

text:
Big order for Volvo Buses - "The largest in Europe"
Volvo Buses and the transport company Transdev have signed an agreement for almost 160 electric buses. The deal was presented at a press conference on Tuesday, reports the Gothenburg Post.
05 Nov 2019, 11:06 by TT, Tue
